== Description ==
[[Image:TinyPack1Screen.png|right|thumb|230px|An arena in which you must fight for your life]] Developed under the false name of "Wonoview" as an experiment to see if Phobus has a distinct mapping style (the conclusion was that he doesn't), this 5 map wad was created in 25 man-hours and challenges the player to fight for his life, then escape with it through small environments following a hellish theme.
This is the first in a possible line of Tiny Packs and maps by Phobus, as they are quite easy and fun to create and fit into a busy schedule easily.
Features:
* 6 maps (5 main levels, and an ending map) * Survival Horror-esque gameplay * New TITLEPIC and INTERPIC * An in game story developed through progression * Plenty of use of ZDoom features * 2 difficulty modes
Single play only.
Made with:
Doombuilder, XWE, MSPaint
More info and more screenshots are available on Phobus' webpage for Tiny Pack 1, linked below.
